species.name: luxray
descriptions: It can see clearly through walls to track down its prey and seek its lost young.
It has eyes that can see through anything. It spots and captures prey hiding behind objects.
Luxray can see through solid objects. It will instantly spot prey trying to hide behind walls, even if the walls are thick.
Luxray’s ability to see through objects comes in handy when it’s scouting for danger.
Seeing through solid objects uses up a lot of Luxray’s electricity, so the Pokémon sleeps for long periods of time to store up energy.

abilities.name: rivalry
abilities.effect: Increases damage inflicted to 1.25× against Pokémon of the same gender, but decreases damage to 0.75× against the opposite gender.

abilities.name: intimidate
abilities.effect: Lowers opponents' Attack one stage upon entering battle.

abilities.name: guts
abilities.effect: Increases Attack to 1.5× with a major status ailment.
